issue.title: [CI] MinGW builds break on system upgrade
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8857](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8857). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See e.g. https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7218/checks?check_run_id=687127263#step:7:69

Started failing sometime today.
